da soyisa kantha rohaledi mawak miyayamata hethuwa thaththwayen bala aushadha yayi oppu kalahoth thama saukhya amathi dhurayen illa aswana bawa saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.kolambaa da soyisa kantha rohaledi pasugiya wasare agosthu masayedi mawak miyayamata hethuwa wuye thaththwayen bala aushadha bawa me sambandhayen pawathwu hadisi marana parikshanayakadi waidyawarayaku prakasha kala yayi ema marana parikshanaya meheya wu hadisi marana parikshakawaraya kala prakashaya pasugiya sathiye madhya mangin pracharaya kerini.eheth ema prakashaya piligatha nohaki bawa amathiwaraya prakasha karayi.thama saukhya amathya dhurayata pathwa masa 18k pamana gatha wi athi bawath me kalaya thula kisima dinaka thaththwayen bala aushadha meratata genwa nomathi bawath amathiwaraya kiya.anuradhapuraya ranorawa gramiya rohala wiwrutha kala awasthawata sahabhagi wemin amathiwaraya eeye (07) me bawa pawasuweya.
